setup_script_description: sets focus on a link before the first disclosure button, and sets the state of the first button to expanded
task: navigate forwards to expanded disclosure button
specific_user_instruction: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions. Note: it should be in the expanded state.
output_assertions: Name, 'What do I do if I have a permit for an assigned lot, but can't find a space there?', is conveyed
State of the button (expanded) is conveyed
